nodes.bodyText: "Defines the user specified parallelism for the sink." ?

@@ -73,6 +73,12 @@
 			"Uniquely identifies the connector of a dynamic table that is used for accessing data in " +
 			"an external system. Its value is used during table source and table sink discovery.");
 
+	public static final ConfigOption<Integer> SINK_PARALLELISM = ConfigOptions
+			.key("sink.parallelism")
+			.intType()
+			.noDefaultValue()
+			.withDescription("Defines the user specified sink parallelism.");

+/**

nodes.bodyText: +1 for this. This makes the responsibility of this interface more clear.

NOTE: This is only for advanced connector developers. + *

Note: This provider is only meant for advanced connector developers. Usually, a sink should consist + * of a single entity expressed via {@link OutputFormatProvider} or {@link SinkFunctionProvider}.
